sn45.14:4.2: “Mendicants, these eight things don’t arise to be developed and cultivated except when a Realized One, a Perfected One, a fully awakened Buddha has appeared.
sn45.14:4.5: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
